title: Hide the Secret Flavor
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Ayumu-san! I got an idea, what if we add this seasoning in? Wouldn’t it add a punch to the hidden flavor?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Setsuna-chan, you shouldn’t add a punch in a hidden flavor, okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I see, because it’s supposed to be hidden right. Then, what about this one? It hides the taste with a completely different taste!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Hmm…. Wouldn’t it be better if you use this one instead?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Then, what about this one, this one, and this one? I think it helps bring out a deep flavor<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>A deep flavor, would that really come out….? Won’t it make the flavor confusing….? Setsuna-chan, we really should hide a hidden flavor, so let’s keep it to 1 type alright?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Is that so…. That’s too bad, but if Ayumu-san says so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay. My part is done for now. Setsuna-chan, I’ll leave the mixing to you♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s really good! You made it really tasty, Setsuna-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah, it’s delicious! Let’s make sweets again, Ayumu-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
